name: Snake (Gameboy)
description:
Here's a version of snake for the gameboy written in assembly.

will be updated!

Can be played here in the browser but the random number generation seems to be a lot worse than with bgb emulator - food often spawns in the exact same place it was just eaten from and looks as though it hasn't been eaten. The same rom hardly ever does this on bgb. I will get round to fixing this.

Source code here: https://github.com/JimMarshall35/gameboy-snake
